sourcesContent:
<template>

        <!--
        <form class="col-12 col-lg-auto mb-3 mb-lg-0 me-lg-3">
          <input type="search" @input="$emit('updateSearch', this.search)" v-model="search" class="form-control form-control-dark" placeholder="Rechercher par école">

            <input type="search" @input="$emit('updateSearch', this.search2)" v-on:click="" v-model="search2" class="form-control form-control-dark" placeholder="Rechercher par livre">
            <button v-on:click="">Rechercher</button>
        </form>
        -->
        <select v-model="ecole">
            <option value="Abjuration">Abjuration</option>
            <option value="Divination">Divination</option>
        </select>

        <form>
            <input type="search" @input="$emit('updateSearch', this.search2)" v-model="search2" class="form-control form-control-dark" placeholder="Rechercher par livre">
        </form>

        <!--
        <searchInfo v-for="spell in livreRecherches" :key="spell[0]" :spell="spell" />
        <searchInfo v-for="spell in ecoleRecherches" :key="spell[2]" :spell="spell" />
        -->


</template>

<script>
import searchInfo from '../searchInfo.vue';


export default {
  name: 'pagesSpell',
  props: ["spells"],
  data: function() {
    return {
      search: ""
    };
  },
  function() {
      return {
        search2: ""
      };
    },
    ecole: '',
  components: {
    searchInfo,

  },
  computed: {
    /* // Filtre dynamique : chercher par l'école
    ecoleRecherches() {
      return this.spells.filter((spell) => spell[2].toLowerCase().includes(this.search.toLowerCase()))
    },
    // Filtre dynamique : chercher par livre
    livreRecherches() {
        return this.spells.filter((spell) => spell[0].toLowerCase().includes(this.search.toLowerCase()))
    }*/
    multiFiltre: function() {
        return this.ecoleRecherches(this.livreRecherches(this.spells))
    }
  }
  Methods: {
    ecoleRecherches: function(spells) {
        return spells.filter((spell) => spell[2].toLowerCase().includes(this.ecole.toLowerCase()))
    },
    livreRecherches: function(spells) {
        return spells.filter((spell) => spell[0].toLowerCase().includes(this.search.toLowerCase()))
    },
  },
}
</script>
